src:
Pengusaha Makin Ragu Berbisnis di RI, Ini Datanya
05 Nov 2019, 07:33 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) kembali merilis Indeks Tendensi Bisnis (ITB). Secara umum laporan ini menunjukkan kondisi bisnis masih tumbuh namun tingkat kepercayaan pelaku usaha menurun.Kepala BPS Suhariyanto mengatakan, pada triwulan III-2019 ITB sebesar 105,33. Angka itu lebih rendah dibandingkan dengan posisi triwulan II-2019 sebesar 108,81."Indeks Tendensi Bisnis masih bagus tapi tingkat optimismenya turun. Masih di atas 100, tapi optimismenya turun," ujarnya di Gedung BPS, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).ITB pada triwulan III-2019 dibentuk beberapa komponen seperti pendapatan usaha 106,92, penggunaan kapasitas produksi 107,56 dan rata-rata jumlah jam kerja dengan nilai 101,51.ITB sendiri merupakan indikator perkembangan dunia usaha yang menggambarkan kondisi bisnis dan perekonomian. Surveinya dilakukan oleh BPS dan Bank Indonesia (BI).BPS memperkirakan ITB pada triwulan IV-2019 akan kembali menurun ke posisi 104,79. Meski menurun angkanya masih di atas 100 yang menunjukkan masih adanya kepercayaan bisnis di Indonesia.

text:
Entrepreneurs are increasingly hesitant to do business in RI, this is the data
05 Nov 2019, 07:33 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - The Central Statistics Agency (BPS) has released the Business Tendency Index (ITB) again. In general, this report shows that business conditions are still growing, but the level of business confidence has declined. Head of BPS Suhariyanto said, in the third quarter of 2019 ITB amounted to 105.33. The figure is lower than the quarter II-2019 position of 108.81. "Business Tendency Index is still good but the level of optimism is down. Still above 100, but the optimism is down," he said at the BPS Building, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5 / 2019) .ITB in the third quarter of 2019 formed several components such as operating income 106.92, the use of production capacity of 107.56 and the average number of hours worked with a value of 101,51.ITB itself is an indicator of the development of the business world that describes business conditions and economy. The survey was conducted by BPS and Bank Indonesia (BI). BP estimates ITB in the fourth quarter of 2019 will again decline to 104.79. Even though the figure is still declining above 100, it shows that there is still business confidence in Indonesia.
